test.name: Verify Todo List website can be able to add to-do tasks successfully

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Add new to do list item
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify the item is already added into to do taks successfully
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Convert To Dictionary
kw.doc: Converts the given ``item`` to a Python ``dict`` type.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Convert To Dictionary
kw.doc: Converts the given ``item`` to a Python ``dict`` type.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Convert To Dictionary
kw.doc: Converts the given ``item`` to a Python ``dict`` type.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Verify first task should be displayed on the top
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Convert To Dictionary
kw.doc: Converts the given ``item`` to a Python ``dict`` type.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Window
kw.doc: Closes currently opened and selected browser window/tab.
